name: Yuci Beishan Coal Mine

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. The Yuci Beishan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Pingdizhen Village, Yuci District, Jinzhong City, Shanxi Province

operators: 山西榆次北山煤业有限公司
owners: 晋中榆次乌金物资贸易有限公司
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Yuci Beishan Coal Industry Co., Ltd. and owned by Jinzhong Yuci Wujin Material Trade Co., Ltd.
